bibl.title: La rivolta di Artabazo in PVindob inv. G 29316 (commentario a Demostene?).
bibl.note: P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 29316 (= M.-P.3 2191; LDAB 4027) was probably not part of a historical work, but it presumably belonged to a (Demosthenic?) commentary. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Claudio Biagetti, La rivolta di Artabazo in PVindob inv. G 29316 (commentario a Demostene?).
P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 29316 (= M.-P.3 2191; LDAB 4027) was probably not part of a historical work, but it presumably belonged to a (Demosthenic?) commentary. - Avec résumé en anglais.
